casebody.data:
STATE
v.
DESPERADOS, INC. and Perez. No. 629A06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 28, 2007. Jeffrey S. Miller, for Desperados & Perez. Seth Edwards, District Attorney, for State. The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 28th day of February 2007 by Attorney General for Extension of Time to file Brief: "Motion Allowed. Attorney General shall have up to and including the 9th day of March 2007 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 28th day of February 2007." Justice HUDSON recused.
